text: 6.10: Sng 103.19-21 naŋga, Mt 7.21 naŋga, 26.39 naŋga, 26.42 naŋga, Lu 11.2 naŋga, 22.42 naŋga, Sɨ 21.14Krunavundi tɨhu naŋga muyɨvɨndahara nandɨ tɨwɨyɨ kɨyɨmu. Nandɨ pɨhuyɨ kɨndu haŋɨnɨŋ na pirɨtamandana vana taya mɨŋahandandu. Krunavundi pɨrɨ nɨñɨ ndahara na pirɨtamandana vana taya mɨŋahandamu.
